ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the phone field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Phone) && NOT(ISNULL(Phone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)) && !REGEX(Phone ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Phone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)) && !REGEX(Phone,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for phone. The minimum number of digits should be 10.
